Package mpe

Class Summary
AutoLauncher AutoLauncher will try to automatically execute MPE processes on remote nodes with SSH.
Command Serializable communication object used between processes.
Configuration An object that encapsulates the configuration context of the display system.
Connection Wraps a TCP connection.
FollowerState Used as a shared object to determine whether all connected processes are ready to render.
FrameLock Used as a wrapper for a binary semaphore to signal when a frame can be drawn.
Process This class facilitates the execution of multiple Processing applications across a distributed environment.
